title: Biomedical SERS – the current state and future trends
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,8957-8979

Dana Cialla-May, Alois Bonifacio, Thomas Bocklitz, Alexey Markin, Natalia Markina, Stefano Fornasaro, Aradhana Dwivedi, Tony Dib, Edoardo Farnesi, Chen Liu, Arna Ghosh, Juergen Popp
Surface enhanced Raman spectroscopy (SERS) is meeting the requirements in biomedical science being a highly sensitive and specific analytical tool.
